author: stepan662
message:
docs: Add Tolgee to app router localization resources (#81366)

Adding Tolgee to available i18n providers.

## Why
Tolgee is listed only in the pages-router, but it actually supports
app-router as well.

files.patch:
@@ -214,3 +214,4 @@ export default async function RootLayout({ children, params }) {
 - [`next-i18n-router`](https://github.com/i18nexus/next-i18n-router)
 - [`paraglide-next`](https://inlang.com/m/osslbuzt/paraglide-next-i18n)
 - [`lingui`](https://lingui.dev)
+- [`tolgee`](https://tolgee.io/apps-integrations/next)
